QuestData.Title: Bloodscalp Insight
QuestData.Description: I never got to properly thank you for saving me.$b$bThank you, $n.$b$bI'm still a little fatigued from my captivity, so I thought you might help me with my studies. As a shaman of the Wildhammer clan, I'm very interested in the shamanic practices of the Bloodscalp tribe.$B$BTheir magic seems to have diverged in an interesting direction. If I had one of the totems that their shaman use, I could begin my studies. You'll find them at the Bal'lal ruins, on the coast to the southwest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Bloodscalp Totem from a Bloodscalp Shaman.
QuestData.CompletionText: Beware: they may put up a fight.
QuestData.RewardText: <Berrin studies the inscriptions on the totem.>$b$bI think I can read this text... Fascinating!$b$bTsul'kalu, Mahamba, Pogeyan... what are these names?
